crossbar_listing.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'port_request' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit([doc.pvt_account_id, doc._id], null); }

port_in_numbers.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'port_request' || doc.pvt_deleted || doc.pvt_port_state == 'completed' || doc.pvt_port_state == 'waiting') return; for (i in doc.numbers) { emit(i, doc.pvt_account_id); } }

listing_by_modified.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'port_request' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit([doc.pvt_modified, doc.pvt_port_state], null); }
